meanings.definition: To strengthen (concrete) by applying tension after it has set.
meanings.sent1: The workers posttensioned the concrete beams to make them stronger.
meanings.sent2: Contractors often posttension concrete structures to ensure durability.
meanings.sent3: Why did the concrete ask for a massage? To posttension itself!
meanings.sent4: The idea of posttensioning concrete is like giving it a power-up.
meanings.sent5: Imagine posttensioning as adding a protective shield to concrete.

meanings.sent1: Posttension is crucial in ensuring the stability of the building.
meanings.sent2: The posttension of the bridge was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The posttension decided to take a break and relax on the construction site.
meanings.sent4: The posttension of the cables symbolizes the strength of the entire structure.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the posttension in action is truly impressive.
